item.title: Project Raijin
item.description: Term: 2021 - 2024 Funding source: NSF Partners: NCAR/CGD, Penn State University, Colorado State University, Max-Planck-Institut für Meteorologie Website: https://raijin.ucar.edu/ Project Raijin, with its original title “Collaborative Research: EarthCube Capabilities: Raijin: Community Geoscience Analysis Tools for Unstructured Mesh Data”, has been awarded by NSF 21-515 EarthCube for an award period of 1 September, 2021 - 31 August, 2024.
